name: Gluttony
description:
Gluttony is a branding and marketing agency with diverse capabilities across all media platforms. Our approach is to closely understand the brands we work with through listening, research and strategy to create content that is tailor-made to the brand’s specific needs. We embrace the latest cultural trends and technology to produce cutting-edge solutions that connect with the target consumer and produce meaningful results.
Our clientele list includes major international brands, such as Google, Clinique, Bulova, Macy’s, L’ Oreal, and Blundstone. Gluttony is headquartered in Manhattan, with offices in London.
